oai_dc:dc.dc:title: David Brisendine's reminiscence of the Battle of Shiloh
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten account of action Cpl. Brisendine, Co. T, 154th (Senior) Tenn. Inf. Regt. witnessed on the first day of battle at Shiloh. He is in line of battle under Gen. Leonidas Polk in the vicinity of Shiloh Church to the rear of Bankhead's battery.; He speaks of meeting General John C. Breckenridge on the battlefield and engaging a large force of the enemy, holding the position for four hours with elements of Gibson's Louisiana Brigade, the 33rd and 27th Tenn. Inf. Regiments.
